pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Symmetric Group: Permutations of a Finite Set // Manipulates invertible functions from a finite set to itself. Can transform from word form to cycle form and back. To cite the package in publications please use Hankin (2020) "Introducing the permutations R package", SoftwareX, volume 11 doi:10.1016/j.softx.2020.100453.
